Description.Text: The Hotel is strategically located south of Stockholm City. Stockholm International Fairs in ÃlvsjÃ¶ is just 4 kilometres away. The hotel is also at at convenient travelling distance from central Stockholm city, the Globe Arenas, Heron City (shopping and entertainment), and Ikea, Kungens Kurva.

Located south of Stockholm city center, have access to the sauna, private parking and free Wi-Fi throughout. The guest rooms are spacious and bright. The Hotel has wooden floors, TV, seating area and an electric kettle. Some rooms also feature a flat-screen TV, refrigerator and air conditioning. The hotel can recommend restaurants and places of interest.
